solution_line_template: Before Cameron broke his hand he could type {minutes} × {wpm_before} = <<{minutes}*{wpm_before}={words_before}>>{words_before} words in {minutes} minutes.
After he broke his hand he could only type {minutes} × {wpm_after} = <<{minutes}*{wpm_after}={words_after}>>{words_after} words in {minutes} minutes.

The difference between the number of words he could type in {minutes} minutes before and after he broke his arm is {words_before} - {words_after} = <<{words_before}-{words_after}={difference}>>{difference} words.
